price: Ka ce: "Ko kun gani, idan ruwanku ya wãyi gari faƙaƙƙe, to, wãne ne zai zo muku da ruwa wani mai ɓuɓɓuga?"*
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَصۡبَحَ مَآؤُكُمۡ غَوۡرٗا فَمَن يَأۡتِيكُم بِمَآءٖ مَّعِينِۭ
footnotes: * Ana so idan mai karatu ya kai ƙarshen wannan sũra ya ce: الله رب العالمين wato Allah Ubagijin halitta. An karanta wannan ãya a gaban wani kãfiri, sai ya ce zã mu fito da ruwan game da amfãni da dundurũsai da farħtani, sai ruwan idãnunsa ya faƙe.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul ara-aytum in aṣbaḥa māukum ghawran faman yatīkum bimāin maʿīnin
